pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Boring Avatarsboringavatars is a Python port of the boring-avatars JS library.![Build Status](https://github.com/federicobond/boringavatars/actions/workflows/python-package.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)[![Supported Versions](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/boringavatars.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/boringavatars)[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)## Install```pip install boringavatars```## Usage```pythonfrom boringavatars import avatar# returns the string corresponding to the generated SVGavatar( "Maria Mitchell", variant="marble", colors=["92A1C6", "146A7C", "F0AB3D", "C271B4", "C20D90"], title=False, size=40, square=True,)```## LicenseMIT
